data.oai_dc:dc: This R program runs a stochastic simulation of the FLP in 100 populations for 500 generations and then plots results at generation 500 (fig. 4D). See Appendix A for the equations used in this program. See Table 2 for parameter values used in this and other figures.
Adaptive radiation|Coevolution|Genetics: quantitative|Macroevolution|Methods: computer simulations|Phylogenetics: comparative|Selection: sexual|Vertebrates
